走在天桥上的是你:
The phrase '走在天桥上的是你' (zǒu zài tiān qiáo shàng de shì nǐ) means 'the one walking on the overpass is you.'

Breakdown:
- 走在 (zǒu zài): walking on
- 走 (zǒu): to walk
- 在 (zài): at, on
- 天桥 (tiān qiáo): overpass or skybridge
- 天 (tiān): sky, heaven
- 桥 (qiáo): bridge
- 上 (shàng): on (here reinforcing location)
- 的 (de): linking particle (indicating a descriptive clause)
- 是 (shì): is
- 你 (nǐ): you
翻开旧手机的讯息:
The phrase '翻开旧手机的讯息' (fān kāi jiù shǒu jī de xùn xí) means 'open up the messages on the old phone.'

Breakdown:
- 翻开 (fān kāi): to flip open
- 翻 (fān): to flip
- 开 (kāi): to open
- 旧手机 (jiù shǒu jī): old phone
- 旧 (jiù): old
- 手机 (shǒu jī): mobile phone
- 手 (shǒu): hand
- 机 (jī): machine, device
- 的 (de): linking particle
- 讯息 (xùn xí): messages or information
- 讯 (xùn): information
- 息 (xí): news, message
这个场景很熟悉:
The phrase '这个场景很熟悉' (zhè ge chǎng jǐng hěn shú xī) means 'This scene is very familiar.'

Breakdown:
- 这个 (zhè ge): this;
- 这 (zhè): this
- 个 (ge): a measure word
- 场景 (chǎng jǐng): scene;
- 场 (chǎng): place, field
- 景 (jǐng): scenery
- 很 (hěn): very
- 熟悉 (shú xī): familiar;
- 熟 (shú): well-known, familiar
- 悉 (xī): to know
触动心底的记忆:
The phrase '触动心底的记忆' (chù dòng xīn dǐ de jì yì) means 'memories that touch the bottom of the heart.'

Breakdown:
- 触动 (chù dòng): to touch or move emotionally;
- 触 (chù): to touch
- 动 (dòng): to move
- 心底 (xīn dǐ): the bottom of the heart;
- 心 (xīn): heart
- 底 (dǐ): bottom
- 的 (de): a linking particle
- 记忆 (jì yì): memory;
- 记 (jì): to remember
- 忆 (yì): to recall
有些选择不是选择题:
The phrase '有些选择不是选择题' (yǒu xiē xuǎn zé bú shì xuǎn zé tí) means 'some choices are not multiple-choice questions.'

Breakdown:
- 有些 (yǒu xiē): some;
- 有 (yǒu): to have
- 些 (xiē): some
- 选择 (xuǎn zé): choices or selections;
- 选 (xuǎn): to choose
- 择 (zé): to select
- 不是 (bú shì): are not;
- 不 (bú): not
- 是 (shì): is
- 选择题 (xuǎn zé tí): multiple-choice question;
- 选择 (xuǎn zé): to choose/select
- 选 (xuǎn): to choose
- 择 (zé): to select
- 题 (tí): question, problem
但是我还过不去:
The phrase '但是我还过不去' (dàn shì wǒ hái guò bù qù) means 'but I still can’t get over it.'

Breakdown:
- 但是 (dàn shì): but;
- 但 (dàn): but
- 是 (shì): is
- 我 (wǒ): I
- 还 (hái): still
- 过不去 (guò bù qù): can’t get over;

- 去 (qù): to go
再次相遇好像还爱你:
The phrase '再次相遇好像还爱你' (zài cì xiāng yù hǎo xiàng hái ài nǐ) means 'meeting again, it seems I still love you.'

Breakdown:

- 还 (hái): still
- 爱 (ài): love
- 你 (nǐ): you
如果能有再一:
The phrase '如果能有再一次的幸运' (rú guǒ néng yǒu zài yí cì de xìng yùn) means 'if there could be one more chance of luck.'

Breakdown:
- 如果 (rú guǒ): if

- 运 (yùn): luck, fortune

The phrase '怀念过不去的过去' (huái niàn guò bù qù de guò qù) means 'yearning for the past that cannot be recovered.'

Breakdown:
- 怀念 (huái niàn): to miss, to yearn for;
- 怀 (huái): to cherish
- 念 (niàn): to think of, miss
- 过不去的 (guò bù qù de): that which cannot be overcome;
- 过不去 (guò bù qù): cannot overcome;
- 过 (guò): to pass
- 不 (bù): not
- 去 (qù): to go
- 的 (de): linking particle
- 过去 (guò qù): the past;
- 过 (guò): past
- 去 (qù): gone
我想你:
The phrase '我想你' (wǒ xiǎng nǐ) means 'I miss you.'

Breakdown:
- 我 (wǒ): I
- 想 (xiǎng): to miss, to think of
- 你 (nǐ): you
我在这里等你:
The phrase '我在这里等你' (wǒ zài zhè lǐ děng nǐ) means 'I am here waiting for you.'

Breakdown:
- 我 (wǒ): I
- 在 (zài): at, in
- 这里 (zhè lǐ): here;
- 这 (zhè): this
- 里 (lǐ): inside
- 等 (děng): to wait
- 你 (nǐ): you
